post.title: Digest - Week 2023/34
post.body:
ㅤ
### [Navigating Dates, Calendars, and Timezones in Salesforce B2C Commerce Cloud - The Rhino Inquisitor](https://www.rhino-inquisitor.com/navigating-dates-calendars-in-sfcc/)
Working with Time Zones, Dates, and Calendars can be tricky in SFCC. Let's have a look at the most important things to keep in mind!
ㅤ
### [Ask HN: What's the biggest red flag you've encountered during a hiring process? | Hacker News](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37210581)
Ask HN: What's the biggest red flag you've encountered during a hiring process? | Hacker News
ㅤ
### [Upcoming .COM and .XYZ domain price increase - Namecheap Blog](https://www.namecheap.com/blog/upcoming-com-and-xyz-domain-price-increase/)
On Sept. 1, .COM and .XYZ domain prices will increase. Learn why this is happening and what you can do to lock in current pricing.
ㅤ
### [Microsoft is bringing Python to Excel - The Verge](https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/22/23841167/microsoft-excel-python-integration-support)
Microsoft is integrating Python into its Excel app. A public preview is available for Microsoft 365 subscribers now and all the Python code runs on the Microsoft Cloud.
ㅤ
### [Hugging Face raises 35M from investors, including Salesforce and Nvidia | TechCrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/24/hugging-face-raises-235m-from-investors-including-salesforce-and-nvidia/)
Hugging Face, a platform for developing AI models and tooling, has raised 35 million in a venture funding round.
post.excerpt: Weekly digest of my readings and interesting topics. Week 34 of 2023.
